summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2019 GRAND DESIGN SOLITUDE 2930 RL. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE STOVE IN THE TRAILER FAILED TO OPERATE. THE CONTACT TOOK THE TRAILER TO RV COUNTRY - FRESNO 3633 S MAPLE AVE, FRESNO, CA 93725 WHERE THEY DISCOVERED THAT THE PROPANE FUEL LINE ATTACH TO THE STOVE HAD MELTED SHUT DUE TO THE FURNACE INSIDE OF THE TRAILER. THE CONTACT THEN SPOKE WITH THE MANUFACTURER WHO STATED THAT THEY WOULD WORK WITH THE DEALER TO REPAIR THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE HAD NOT BEEN REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN. *DT  *AS
